job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client hcl global systems is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgtrole lead software engineer location alpharetta ga san jose ca required skills years of hands on experience in developing highly scalable and available application infrastructure you have a reputation as a proven software engineer with deep knowledge of data structures algorithms multithreaded programming and software design strong objectoriented skills with cjava must have c background minimum understanding of system architecture including processors storage and networking is highly desirable experience with systems programming amp programming in linux environment you communicate clearly and write well and can explain just about anything to anyone and yoursquore competent in communicating in writing and on the phone strong analytical skills experience in distributed systems good exposure in building and maintaining ci pipelines you are a great team player and passionate problem solver ability to communicate at all levels of an organization and establish relationships self driven and independently work with minimal guidance bachelorrsquos degree or higher in computer science computer engineer or similar thanks regards srikanth technical recruiter hcl global systems inc email id mailto
